POWERED by FUSION

An individual post follows.

Beats Like Venomous Acid-Blood Burning Though A Space Station’s Metal Floor

If you’ve got any love for DJ /rupture, Kid606, Broklyn Beats, or any of the other raggabreakcore playas, grab the mix linked up right here ASAP. Like, you should have done it yesterday, and kept it on loop since then. As if being a lady DJ whose namesake is the bad ass sister from Alien isn’t enough, soundgirl Ripley goes dropping and cutting up shit you wouldn’t even think. <3.

—Feb 16, 2004
